00018 #include <iostream>
00019 #include <fstream>
00020 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00021 #include <stdio.h>
00022 #include <stdexcept>
00023 #include "xmltopologyreader.h"
00024 
00025 namespace votca { namespace csg {
00026 
00027 bool XMLTopologyReader::ReadTopology(string filename, Topology &top)
00028 { 
00029   _top = &top;
00030 
00031   _parser.NextHandler(this, &XMLTopologyReader::ParseRoot);
00032   _parser.Open(filename);
00033     
00034   return true;
00035 }
00036 
00037 void XMLTopologyReader::ReadTopolFile(string file)
00038 {
00039     TopologyReader *reader;
00040     reader = TopReaderFactory().Create(file);
00041     if(!reader)
00042         throw runtime_error(file + ": unknown topology format");
00043     
00044     reader->ReadTopology(file, *_top);
00045     
00046     delete reader;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void XMLTopologyReader::ParseRoot(const string &el, map<string, string> &attr)
00050 {
00051     if(el == "topology") {
00052         if(attr["base"] != "")
00053             ReadTopolFile(attr["base"]);
00054         _parser.NextHandler(this, &XMLTopologyReader::ParseTopology);
00055     }
00056     else {
00057         throw std::runtime_error("wrong root node in xml topology file");
00058     }
00059 }
00060 
00061 void XMLTopologyReader::ParseTopology(const string &el, map<string, string> &attr)
00062 {
00063     if(el == "molecules")
00064          _parser.NextHandler(this, &XMLTopologyReader::ParseMolecules);
00065 }
00066 
00067 void XMLTopologyReader::ParseMolecules(const string &el, map<string, string> &attr)
00068 {
00069     map<string, string>::iterator iter;
00070     if (el == "clear") {
00071         _top->ClearMoleculeList();
00072         _parser.IgnoreChilds();
00073     }
00074     else if (el == "rename") {
00075         string molname = attr["name"];
00076         string range = attr["range"];
00077         if (molname == "" || range == "")
00078             throw runtime_error("invalid rename tag");
00079         _top->RenameMolecules(range, molname);
00080         _parser.IgnoreChilds();
00081     }
00082     if (el == "define") {
00083         string molname = attr["name"];
00084         string first = attr["first"];
00085         string nbeads = attr["nbeads"];
00086         string nmols = attr["nmols"];
00087         if (molname == "" && first == "" && nbeads == "" && nmols == "")
00088             throw runtime_error("invalid define tag");
00089         _top->CreateMoleculesByRange(molname,
00090                 boost::lexical_cast<int>(first),
00091                 boost::lexical_cast<int>(nbeads),
00092                 boost::lexical_cast<int>(nmols));
00093         _parser.IgnoreChilds();
00094     }
00095 }
00096 
00097 }}
